definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: flow, run (Aram. id., but rare and dub.;—secondary form of [[מסס]] q.v.);—Impf. 3 ms. [[וֶיִּמָּאֵס]] Job 7:5 my skin hath hardened and run (i. e. again, afresh; > GHoffm Du rd. [[וַיִּמַּס]], Bu [[וַיִּמָּאס]], √ [[מסס]]); 3 mpl. [[כְּמוֹ מַיִם יִמָּֽאֲסוּ]] Ps 58:8 (fig. of annihilation of wicked).
